subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When a meeting between a coach and an athletic director follow three turmoil-ridden seasons, an N.C.A.A. probation and the worst bowl loss in team history, someone is getting fired.
snippet: When a meeting between a coach and an athletic director follow three turmoil-ridden seasons, an N.C.A.A. probation and the worst bowl loss in team history, someone is getting fired.
